Module.Content: <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="Pick Your DAW" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#000000; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>Pick Your DAW</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/daw-specific-discussions/cakewalk">Cakewalk</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/daw-specific-discussions/garage-band">Garage Band</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/daw-specific-discussions/logic">Logic</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/daw-specific-discussions/presonus-studio-one">Presonus Studio One</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/daw-specific-discussions/reaper">Reaper</option> </select>
